name: Retro Flowers Kindle or Nook Cover PADDED AND ZIPPER CLOSURE
description:
Keep your Kindle / Nook safe and looking as new! 

The outer shell is 100% cotton fabric with retro flowers print. Includes a layer of batting to protect your baby and fully lined with 100% off write cotton fabric.

Beige zipper closure.

Machine washable with cold setting, warm iron.

Cover as listed will fit to a Kindle 1, 2 or Nook without a cover. I can customize it to fit to Kindle 3, Kobo, Sony ereader, Pandigital novel or any other reading device. I can also make it big enough to fit to a cover. Please contact me for details

Happy reading!
